info.title: Cardano - Blockchain Indexer API
info.description: Core indexer endpoints dedicated to Cardano.

get.description: Returns various information regarding a stake account

parameters.name: stake_addr
parameters.description: Bech32 encoded reward/stake address ('stake1...')

parameters.name: amounts-as-strings
parameters.description: Large numbers returned as strings if set to `true`

200.description: Information about the account

get.description: Returns a list of addresses seen on-chain which use the specified stake key. By default returns addresses which currently control at least one UTxO, or use `include_empty` query parameter to also return addresses which don't currently control any UTxOs.

parameters.name: stake_addr
parameters.description: Bech32 encoded stake/reward address ('stake1...')

parameters.name: include_empty
parameters.description: Include addresses that have been seen on-chain but have no balance

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

200.description: Addresses seen on-chain which contain the specified stake key

get.description: Returns a list of native assets which are owned by addresses with the specified stake key

parameters.name: stake_addr
parameters.description: Bech32 encoded reward/stake address ('stake1...')

parameters.name: policy
parameters.description: Filter results to only show assets of the specified policy

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

parameters.name: amounts-as-strings
parameters.description: Large numbers returned as strings if set to `true`

200.description: A list of assets which are owned by addresses that use the specified stake key

get.description: Returns list of delegation actions relating to a stake account

parameters.name: stake_addr
parameters.description: Bech32 encoded stake/reward address ('stake1...')

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by epoch number)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

200.description: Stake account delegations

get.description: Returns per-epoch history for the specified stake key

parameters.name: stake_addr
parameters.description: Bech32 encoded stake/reward address ('stake1...')

parameters.name: epoch_no
parameters.description: Fetch result for only a specific epoch

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by epoch number)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

parameters.name: amounts-as-strings
parameters.description: Large numbers returned as strings if set to `true`

200.description: Per-epoch history of the specified stake key

get.description: Returns a list of staking-related rewards for the specified stake key (pool `member` or `leader` rewards, deposit `refund`)

parameters.name: stake_addr
parameters.description: Bech32 encoded stake/reward address ('stake1...')

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by epoch number)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

parameters.name: amounts-as-strings
parameters.description: Large numbers returned as strings if set to `true`

200.description: Staking rewards for the specified stake key (pool-member and pool-leader rewards, deposit refunds)

get.description: Returns a list of updates relating to the specified stake key (`registration`, `deregistration`, `delegation`, `withdrawal`)

parameters.name: stake_addr
parameters.description: Bech32 encoded stake/reward address ('stake1...')

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by absolute slot)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

200.description: Updates relating to the specified stake key (registration, deregistration, delegation, withdrawal)

post.description:
Returns transactions in which at least one of a list specified payment credentials spent or received funds, or was a required signer.

Specifically, "spent or received funds" meaning: the payment credential was used in an address which controlled at least one of the transaction inputs and/or receives one of the outputs AND the transaction is phase-2 valid, OR, the address controlled at least one of the collateral inputs and/or receives the collateral return output AND the transaction is phase-2 invalid. [Read more](https://docs.cardano.org/plutus/collateral-mechanism/).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by point in chain)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only transactions minted on or after a specific slot

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only transactions minted on or before a specific slot

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

200.description: Transactions involving payment credentials

post.description: Return detailed information on UTxOs which are controlled by some payment credential in a list of payment credentials. No more than 100 payment credentials can be provided.

parameters.name: resolve_datums
parameters.description: Try find and include the corresponding datums for datum hashes

parameters.name: with_cbor
parameters.description: Include the CBOR encodings of the transaction outputs in the response

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

parameters.name: amounts-as-strings
parameters.description: Large numbers returned as strings if set to `true`

200.description: Unspent transaction outputs

get.description: Return total amount of assets, including ADA, in UTxOs controlled by a specific payment credential

parameters.name: credential
parameters.description: Payment credential in bech32 format

200.description: Lovelace and native asset balance of payment credential

get.description:
Returns transactions in which the specified payment credential spent or received funds, or was a required signer.

Specifically, "spent or received funds" meaning: the payment credential was used in an address which controlled at least one of the transaction inputs and/or receives one of the outputs AND the transaction is phase-2 valid, OR, the address controlled at least one of the collateral inputs and/or receives the collateral return output AND the transaction is phase-2 invalid. [Read more](https://docs.cardano.org/plutus/collateral-mechanism/).

parameters.name: credential
parameters.description: Payment credential in bech32 format

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by point in chain)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only transactions minted on or after a specific slot

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only transactions minted on or before a specific slot

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

200.description: Get the transactions for an address

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by slot at which UTxO was produced)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or after a specific slot

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or before a specific slot

parameters.name: cursor

parameters.name: amounts-as-strings
parameters.description: Large numbers returned as strings if set to `true`

200.description: Get all unspent transaction outputs at addresses with the given payment credential

get.description:
Returns transactions in which the specified address spent or received funds.

Specifically, the transactions where: the address controlled at least one of the transaction inputs and/or receives one of the outputs AND the transaction is phase-2 valid, OR, the address controlled at least one of the collateral inputs and/or receives the collateral return output AND the transaction is phase-2 invalid. [Read more](https://docs.cardano.org/plutus/collateral-mechanism/).

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address in bech32 format

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by point in chain)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only transactions minted on or after a specific slot

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only transactions minted on or before a specific slot

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

200.description: Get the transactions for an address

get.description:
Returns the number of transactions in which the address spent or received some funds.

Specifically, the number of transactions where: the address controlled at least one of the transaction inputs and/or receives one of the outputs AND the transaction is phase-2 valid, OR, the address controlled at least one of the collateral inputs and/or receives the collateral return output AND the transaction is phase-2 invalid. [Read more](https://docs.cardano.org/plutus/collateral-mechanism/).

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address in bech32 format

200.description: Get the transaction count for an address

get.summary: Accounts of addresses holding specific asset
get.description:
Returns a list of accounts (as stake/reward addresses) associated with addresses which control some of the specified asset; in other words, instead of returning the addresses which hold some of the asset, the addresses are merged by their delegation part/account. Assets controlled by Byron, enterprise, or pointer addresses are omitted.

CAUTION: An asset being associated with a particular stake account does not necessarily mean the owner of that account controls the asset; use "asset addresses" unless you are sure you want to work with stake keys. Read more [here]( https://medium.com/adamant-security/multi-sig-concerns-mangled-addresses-and-the-dangers-of-using-stake-keys-in-your-cardano-project-94894319b1d8).

parameters.name: asset
parameters.description: Asset, encoded as concatenation of hex of policy ID and asset name

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

parameters.name: amounts-as-strings
parameters.description: Large numbers returned as strings if set to `true`

200.description: Returns stake addresses for accounts which control some of the specified asset

get.summary: Accounts of addresses holding assets of specific policy
get.description:
Returns a list of accounts (as stake/reward addresses) associated with addresses which control some of an asset of the specified policy; in other words, instead of returning the addresses which hold the assets, the addresses are merged by their delegation part/account. Assets controlled by Byron, enterprise, or pointer addresses are omitted.

CAUTION: An asset being associated with a particular stake account does not necessarily mean the owner of that account controls the asset; use "asset addresses" unless you are sure you want to work with stake keys. Read more [here]( https://medium.com/adamant-security/multi-sig-concerns-mangled-addresses-and-the-dangers-of-using-stake-keys-in-your-cardano-project-94894319b1d8).

parameters.description: Hex encoded Policy ID

parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

parameters.name: amounts-as-strings
parameters.description: Large numbers returned as strings if set to `true`

post.description:
Executes the redeemers of a transaction in order to compute how many execution units are needed for each, without submitting the transaction to the chain and without requiring the transaction to be fully-valid.

Useful during transaction building to compute what budget should be used for each redeemer.

Note that all transaction inputs and reference inputs must be able to be resolved (we must be able to find the contents of that UTxO by finding the UTxO on-chain) in order to evaluate the transaction. If your transaction contains any inputs which may not be found on-chain at the time of evaluation, for example if you are transaction chaining, then you must pass in these inputs and their corresponding transaction output bytes as additional UTxOs.

With Additional UTxOs.summary: Transaction evaluation request with additional input UTxOs

Without Additional UTxOs.summary: Transaction evaluation request without additional UTxOs

200.description: Details of executed redeemers

post.description: Returns the specified transaction outputs. Returns 404 if any of the outputs specified do not exist unless the `allow_missing` query parameter is set to `true`. Results are sorted lexicographically by output reference and duplicates are omitted. Do not change the output references parameter while paginating.

parameters.name: resolve_datums
parameters.description: Try find and include the corresponding datums for datum hashes

parameters.name: with_cbor
parameters.description: Include the CBOR encoding of the transaction output in the response

parameters.name: allow_missing
parameters.description: Do not return 404 if any transactions are not found (404 will still be returned if you specify an index higher than the number of outputs in a transaction)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

200.description: Get transaction outputs via output references

get.description: Returns detailed information about a transaction

parameters.name: tx_hash
parameters.description: Transaction hash in hex

parameters.name: amounts-as-strings
parameters.description: Large numbers returned as strings if set to `true`

200.description: Detailed information about the specified transaction

get.description: Returns hex-encoded CBOR bytes of a transaction

parameters.name: tx_hash
parameters.description: Transaction Hash

200.description: Get a transaction's hex encoded cbor via a transaction hash

get.description:
Returns the address which was specified in the given transaction output.

Note that if the transaction is invalid this will only return a result for the collateral return output, should one be present in the transaction. If the transaction is valid it will not return a result for the collateral return output.

parameters.name: tx_hash
parameters.description: Transaction Hash

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Output Index

200.description: Get an address via a transaction output reference

get.description: Returns the specified transaction output. Attempts to resolve the datum hash to the corresponding bytes and JSON, should the output contain a datum hash.

parameters.name: with_cbor
parameters.description: Include the CBOR encoding of the transaction output in the response

parameters.name: tx_hash
parameters.description: Transaction Hash

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Output Index

parameters.name: amounts-as-strings
parameters.description: Large numbers returned as strings if set to `true`

200.description: Get a transaction output via it's output reference

pool_id.description: Bech32 encoded pool ID the account is delegating to

slot.description: Absolute slot of the block which contained the transaction

spendable_epoch.description: Epoch at which the reward is spendable

deposit.description: Deposit in lovelace if action is Registration

tx_hash.description: Transaction hash of the transaction which performed the action

AddressInfo.description: Information decoded from a Cardano address

AddressTransaction.description: Transaction which involved a specific address

input.description: Address controlled at least one of the consumed UTxOs

output.description: Address controlled at least one of the produced UTxOs

slot.description: Absolute slot of the block which contains the transaction

unit.description: Asset (either `lovelace` or concatenation of hex encoded policy ID and asset name for native asset)

AssetHolderAccount.description: Account which controls some of a specific asset

AssetInPolicyMint.description: Name of asset of a specific policy and amount minted or burned

amount.description: Amount of asset minted (negative if burned)

AssetInfo.description: Information about a specific Cardano native-asset

asset_name.description: Hex encoding of the asset name

asset_name_ascii.description: ASCII representation of the asset name

burn_tx_count.description: Number of transactions which burned some of the asset

latest_mint_tx_metadata.description: Metadata of the most recent transaction which minted or burned the asset

total_supply.description: Total amount of the asset in existence currently

asset_name_ascii.description: ASCII representation of the asset name

mint_tx_count.description: Number of transactions which minted some of the asset

total_supply.description: Total amount of the asset in existence currently

cip25_metadata.description: CIP-25 metadata for a specific asset

AuthCommitteeHotCert.description: Authorizes the constitutional committee hot credential

cert_index.description: Index of the certificate in the transaction

Balance.description: Payment credential, the payment part of a Cardano address

assets.description: Total amount of different native assets in controlled UTxOs, as a map of minting policy to asset names to amounts

lovelace.description: Total amount of lovelace in controlled UTxOs

absolute_slot.description: Absolute slot when block was minted

block_producer.description: Identifier of stake pool which minted the block

confirmations.description: Number of blocks which have been minted since the block

epoch.description: Epoch in which block was minted

epoch_slot.description: Epoch slot at which block was minted

next_block.description: Block hash of the next block

previous_block.description: Block hash of the previous block

size.description: Size of the block body in bytes

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp when the block was minted

total_output_lovelace.description: Total lovelace in outputs of transactions included in the block

tx_hashes.description: Ordered transaction hashes for the transactions in the block

cert_index.description: Position of certificate redeemer attempting to authenticate in sorted certificates

block_hash.description: Block hash of the most recent block

height.description: Height (number) of the most recent block

slot.description: Absolute slot of the most recent block

extra.description: Custom user defined Plutus data CBOR bytes

CurrentEpochInfo.description: Information summary of the current epoch

blk_count.description: Total blocks in the epoch so far

fees.description: Total fees collected in the epoch so far

start_time.description: UNIX timestamp when the epoch began

tx_count.description: Total transactions in the epoch so far

DRepCredential.description: Payment credential, the payment part of a Cardano address

bech32.description: Bech32-encoding of the credential key hash or script hash

hex.description: Hex-encoding of the script or key credential

bytes.description: Hex encoded datum CBOR bytes (`null` if datum type is `hash` and corresponding datum bytes have not been seen on-chain)

json.description: JSON representation of the datum (`null` if datum type is `hash` and corresponding datum bytes have not been seen on-chain)

DatumOptionType.description: Datum type (inline datum or datum hash)

active_epoch_no.description: Epoch at which the delegation becomes active

latest_delegation_tx_hash.description: Transaction hash relating to the most recent delegation

active_stake.description: Total active stake for the epoch

average_reward.description: Average reward for block producers during the epoch

end_time.description: UNIX timestamp when the epoch ended

fees.description: Total fees collected in the epoch

start_time.description: UNIX timestamp when the epoch began

total_rewards.description: Total rewards earned by block producers during the epoch

EvaluatedRedeemer.description: Identifier of an evaluated redeemer and the execution units required to execute it

redeemer_index.description: Index for the redeemer tag (which input, policy, etc)

ExUnits.description: Execution unit budget for executing a redeemer

Holders.description: Number of holders of at least one of a specific asset or assets of a specific policy, by address or address staking part

by_account.description: Number of unique staking keys used in addresses which control at least one of an asset of the policy ID

by_address.description: Number of unique addresses which control at least one of an asset of the policy ID

LastUpdated.description: Details of the most recent block processed by the indexer (aka chain tip); that is, the data returned is correct as of this block in time.

block_hash.description: Hex-encoded hash of the most recently processed block (aka chain tip)

block_slot.description: Absolute slot of the most recently processed block (aka chain tip)

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp of when the most recently processed block was minted

MaxBlockBodySize.description: Maximum number of bytes allowed for a block body

bytes.description: Maximum number of bytes allowed for a block body

MaxBlockHeaderSize.description: Maximum number of bytes allowed for a block header

bytes.description: Maximum number of bytes allowed for a block header

MaxReferenceScriptsSize.description: Maximum reference script size (introduced in Conway)

MaxTransactionSize.description: Maximum number of bytes allowed for a transaction

bytes.description: Maximum number of bytes allowed for a transaction

MinFeeReferenceScripts.description: Parameters for reference script fee calculation (introduced in Conway)

unit.description: Asset (represented as concatenation of hex encoded policy ID and asset name)

policy.description: Asset policy (hash of script being executed)

MintTransaction.description: Transaction hash with details of when that transaction appeared on-chain

amount.description: Amount of asset minted or burned (negative if burned)

MintingTx.description: Transaction which minted or burned a specific asset

block_timestamp.description: UNIX timestamp of the block which included transaction

mint_amount.description: Amount of the asset minted or burned (negative if burned)

MirCert.description: Certificate for sending an instantaneous reward (moving funds from treasury or reserves pot to the other pot or to stake accounts)

accounts.description: List of stake accounts with corresponding reward amounts (null if `to` is 'reserves' or 'treasury')

other_pot.description: Amount transfered to the other pot (null if `to` is 'accounts')

MirSource.description: The pot from which an MIR reward is being funded by

MirTarget.description: Where the MIR reward(s) are being sent

oneOf.description: String representation of an integer or number

NumOrString.description: Integer or number by default, or a string representation if the `amounts-as-strings` header is set to `true`
